title: The Todd Starnes Show – September 23rd, 2019
text:
Here's what happened on the Todd Starnes Show:

Todd speaks with conservative filmmaker "Fog City Midge" about her video of children being taught anti-Trump chants at a protest.



Email Embed

Watch the latest video at foxnews.com

Todd speaks with Fox News Contributor Liz Peek about the strength President Trump is showing with Hispanic voters in 2020.

description:
Here's what happened on the Todd Starnes Show:

Todd speaks with conservative filmmaker "Fog City Midge" about her video of children being taught anti-Trump chants at a protest.



Todd speaks with Fox News Contributor Liz Peek about the strength President Trump is showing with Hispanic voters
